translation.en: [man over intercom] Number one, step forward and face the mirror.
translation.it: Numero uno, fai un passo avanti.

translation.en: Number two.
Number three.
Four.
Have another look at this one, ma'am…
if you get my meaning.
We're talking about violent killings. Murder, ma'am.
translation.it: Si tratta di omicidi violenti, signora.

translation.en: Is this not the woman you saw?
translation.it: È questa la donna che ha visto?

translation.en: [man] Zenzile Mwale.
Zenzi. Do you… Do you mind if I call you Zenzi?
translation.it: Zenzi. Ti dispiace se ti chiamo Zenzi?

translation.en: You've had quite a week, huh?
A trail of bodies all over the damn city. Dead criminals falling from the sky.
translation.it: Una scia di cadaveri in tutta la città. Criminali morti come se piovesse.

translation.en: Right. Start talking.
Why did you murder these men?
Eyewitnesses, CCTV cameras, they put you on the scene.
translation.it: Testimoni e telecamere ti collocano sulla scena.

translation.en: You're caught red-handed.
What the hell are you mixed up in?
Who are you?
I am just a cleaner.
Hey, you.
So, how's the little guy doing?
-[Zenzi] Who said it was a guy? -I can feel it. I'm sure it's a guy.
translation.it: - E se non fosse maschio? - Me lo sento. Ne sono sicuro.

translation.en: Damn it.
[man] Ah. Morning, Zenzi.
Running late, hmm?
Morning, Mr. Booysen. What have I told you? Call me Enrico.
translation.it: - Buongiorno, sig. Booysen. - Ti prego, chiamami Enrico.

translation.en: I'm your landlord, but I'm also a friend.
translation.it: Sono un amico oltre al proprietario.

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
You're three weeks late again. Enough is enough.
translation.it: Sei di nuovo in ritardo di tre settimane. Ora basta.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I'm sorry, Mr. Booysen.
I've taken on extra shifts. I'll make up the rent. Please.
translation.it: Sto facendo i doppi turni. Riuscirò a pagare l'affitto, la prego.

translation.en: I just need more time.
Hey. You know I'm here to help, na?
translation.it: Ehi. Sai che sono qui per aiutarti.

translation.en: If we need to put our heads together and, uh, make a plan.
translation.it: Se vuoi, possiamo trovare una soluzione insieme.

translation.en: I just don't want to see you out on the street.
translation.it: Non voglio saperti in mezzo a una strada.

translation.en: Not after…
You know?
And without a man to protect you.
translation.it: E senza un uomo che ti protegga.

translation.en: Well… today's the day.
translation.it: Beh, oggi è il grande giorno.

translation.en: -Today? -[Zenzi] Hmm.
Max is coming home.
-Good. Maybe now I'll see my money. -[door opens]
translation.it: Bene, forse adesso vedrò i miei soldi.

translation.en: [woman in Afrikaans] Enrico! Where are you?
Your breakfast.
[woman in English] Summer! Mummy's home.
Hi, Zenzi.
Ma'am, did you remember that today-- You didn't forget to collect Summer, did you, Zenzi?
translation.it: - Signora, ricorda che… - Non ti sei dimenticata di Summer, vero?

translation.en: Summer? [chuckles] No. I've never even met her.
translation.it: Summer? No… Non so nemmeno come sia fatta.

translation.en: Missed me!
[gasps] My sneaky little girl.
Oh! I did. I did. I did. Oh.
[boy] Mama?
[boy in Tswana] It's for Papa when you take me to visit him. You promised.
translation.it: Lo darò a papà quando lo vedrò. Me lo avevi promesso.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I know, baby. I know.
[in English] Uh, ma'am.
I need to leave a bit early today.
translation.it: Oggi devo andare via un po' prima.

translation.en: It's today? That he gets out?
H-how long has it been?
Two years now.
Are you sure about this?
Come on, he put you through so much.
translation.it: Te ne ha fatte passare così tante.

translation.en: He's changed, ma'am.
Toxic men never change.
Sometimes it's best to leave our past behind us.
translation.it: A volte è meglio lasciarsi il passato alle spalle.

translation.en: Okay?
Hello, sir. I'm here to fetch my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.it: Salve, sono venuta a prendere mio marito, Maxwell Mwale.

translation.en: Uh, wait over there.
[Zenzi] Oh, okay.
Hello.
[woman] I missed you.
-[pounding on door] -[Zenzi] Okay, okay, I'm coming.
Max Mwale, you're under arrest for the murder of Yazid Noordien.
translation.it: Maxwell Mwale, è in arresto per l'omicidio di Yazid Noordien.

translation.en: [Zenzi] What?
-[in Tswana] What's going on? -[in English] I love you.
[in Tswana] No, wait.
-[in English] Move it! -This is a mistake. Wait.
-Max, what is this? -[siren blaring]
Who are you waiting for, sister?
Um, my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
He was supposed to be released today at 5:00. I got here just after 5:00.
translation.it: Doveva uscire alle 15:00, ma sono arrivata in ritardo.

translation.en: It says here he was released this morning.
He's gone, sister.
He's gone?
[guard] I don't know what to tell you. Your husband's a free man.
translation.it: - No. - Non so che dirti. Tuo marito è libero.

translation.en: Congratulations. But he's not here.
[whispering] Zenzi, do you know what time it is?
Alice, have you seen Max?
translation.it: - Alice, hai visto Max? - Mi prendi in giro?

translation.en: -Is this a joke? -No. No. He got out today.
translation.it: - Alice, hai visto Max? - Mi prendi in giro? No, è uscito oggi, ma non è a casa.

translation.en: But he's not home.
translation.it: No, è uscito oggi, ma non è a casa.

translation.en: Well, if I saw him, I would chase him away unless he brings the rent.
translation.it: Se lo vedessi, lo caccerei a meno che non pagasse l'affitto.

translation.en: Anyway, you're better off without him. Count yourself lucky.
translation.it: A ogni modo, è una fortuna che non sia qui con te.

translation.en: Did Enrico tell you? We're selling the house.
translation.it: Te l'ha detto Enrico? Vendiamo la casa.

translation.en: We don't have a choice anymore.
You're gonna have to find somewhere else to live for free. You've got till the end of the month to pack up your things.
translation.it: Dovrai trovare un altro posto in cui vivere gratis entro fine mese.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I'd like to report a missing person, please.
Missing person? Yes, my husband.
translation.it: - Una scomparsa? - Sì, di mio marito.

translation.en: Name?
His name. Oh. Maxwell.
[in Afrikaans] Ay. It's these Zimbabweans again.
The husband is off with his mistress, and the wife comes to us to find him.
translation.it: Il marito è con l'amante e la moglie viene da noi a cercarlo.

translation.en: -[in English] Cry me a river. -[police officers laugh]
I can hear you.
I am not Zimbabwean. I'm from Bethlehem in the Free State.
translation.it: Vengo da Bethlehem, nello Stato Libero,

translation.en: And my husband is not with some mistress.
translation.it: e mio marito non è con l'amante.

translation.en: He got out of jail today. He was supposed to come home, but he didn't.
translation.it: Oggi è uscito di prigione, ma non è tornato a casa.

translation.en: So are you going to help me or not?
Look, these men are trouble, sister.
translation.it: Quegli uomini sono solo fonte di guai.

translation.en: He's probably out drinking with friends, having a good time.
translation.it: Sarà fuori a bere con gli amici, a divertirsi.

translation.en: Maybe you're better off.
Hi, this is Naledi.
Don't leave a voicemail. Just text me. Thanks, bye.
translation.it: Non lasciare un messaggio. Scrivimi. Grazie, ciao.

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for this guy,
-Have you seen him? -Huh-uh.
Hello.
I'm looking for this guy. Have you seen him? Max.
translation.it: Sto cercando quest'uomo. Lo hai visto? Max.

translation.en: [man] Hey.
I know you.
Max's piece of ass.
translation.it: Tu sei la gnocca che sta con Max.

translation.en: Wait. You know Max?
translation.it: Un attimo. - Conosci Max? - Max è in prigione.

translation.en: Max is in jail, sister.
translation.it: - Conosci Max? - Max è in prigione.

translation.en: -No, no, he got out. -Well, he's not here.
translation.it: - No, è uscito. - Beh, non è qui.

translation.en: You need a new man to warm your bed, eh? [chuckles]
translation.it: - Vuoi che un altro uomo ti riscaldi? - No.

translation.en: No. Leave me. Leave me.
Fuck off, you drunk shit.
Well, if Max isn't in jail, he's dead.
translation.it: Se non è in prigione, è morto.

translation.en: So fuck him. And fuck you!
translation.it: Quindi vaffanculo a lui e a te.

translation.en: What are you playing, coming here?
I was just trying to find my husband.
He wasn't at the prison, and he didn't come home.
translation.it: Non era né in prigione, né a casa.

translation.en: I don't know where to look anymore.
[sighs] No one will help me. I will help you.
translation.it: - Nessuno vuole aiutarmi. - Lo farò io.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
I… I really need to get home.
translation.it: Sarà meglio che torni a casa.

translation.en: I will walk you home.
Safe.
[chuckles] Fuck.
Okay. Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
Anything you need…
I'm here.
Okay.
Good night, Mr. Booysen.
I should fix that door for you.
Oh, no, it's okay. I'm already used to it.
[Enrico] And the rent?
Make a plan.
[Enrico] Zenzi.
-[Enrico] Zenzi, open the door. -[banging on door]
[Enrico] Bitch.
[Enrico] Zenzi, I'm just trying to help you.
[grunting] Zenzi.
Zenzi. Zenzi.
[Alice in Afrikaans] Enrico! Leave that bloody maid, before I put you both on the street!
translation.it: Enrico! Lascia in pace quella cameriera prima che vi butti in mezzo alla strada!

translation.en: [Enrico in English] Fucking cock teaser.
No wonder he's not coming back. Anything to get away from you.
translation.it: Per forza non è tornato, farebbe di tutto pur di starti alla larga.

translation.en: [judge] How do you plead?
[Max] Guilty.
I killed Yazid Noordien.
You do realize that if you are lying, not only are you in contempt of court,
translation.it: Sa che se mente, non solo sarà accusato di oltraggio alla corte,

translation.en: but you're leaving the real criminals on the street?
I do.
I killed him.
Hello?
Who is this?
Max, is that you?
[Max] After everything I've done, why are you still here?
translation.it: Dopo ciò che ho fatto, perché sei ancora qui?

translation.en: [in Tswana] I am your wife, Max.
[in English] Esulu is your son.
I know who you really are.
[in Tswana] Then maybe this is my chance to change.
translation.it: È la mia occasione per cambiare.

translation.en: [in English] For the better.
Whatever it takes.
[Zenzi in Tswana] Why, Max?
[in English] What is it you're not telling me?
What are you involved in? Please, whatever it is…
translation.it: In cosa ti sei cacciato? Qualunque cosa sia…

translation.en: don't do it.
Ah. It's just you.
I thought it was somebody important.
If living in your own filth is so important, I can leave.
translation.it: Se vivere nella sua sporcizia è importante, me ne vado.

translation.en: [groans] Well, you did come all this way.
[in Tswana] Is it Tuesday already?
I see you have been writing.
[sighs] Columns. For my sins.
It's juice. I know what's good for me.
translation.it: È succo. So badare a me stesso.

translation.en: After a week-long search led by local police,
Garth's body was ultimately recovered near a stream in Philippi.
translation.it: il corpo di Garth è stato ritrovato nei pressi di un ruscello a Philippi.

translation.en: With me today are his daughter, Melanie, and wife, Karen,
translation.it: Qui con me, ci sono la figlia, Melanie, e la moglie, Karen,

translation.en: who are recounting their harrowing journey
in their hopes of finding justice…
Very intellectual.
[in Tswana] It's no Felicia, but it hits the spot.
translation.it: Non è Felicia, ma centra il bersaglio.

translation.en: [in English] 1996 called.
[host on TV] And when did you know he wasn't coming home? That he was dead?
translation.it: …e quando hai capito che non sarebbe tornato? Che era morto?

translation.en: [Melanie on TV] He hadn't called. He always called.
I just looked at my mom, and I knew.
translation.it: Ho guardato mia madre e… Me lo sentivo.

translation.en: If you want to study humanity, you should watch daytime TV talk shows.
translation.it: Se vuoi studiare l'umanità, basta guardare i talk show del mattino.

translation.en: [host] You suspect there might be more to it. [Melanie] There has to be more to it. He had enemies. We knew this.
translation.it: - Sospetti che ci sia dell'altro. - Deve. Sapevamo che aveva dei nemici.

translation.en: The daughter did it.
-[Melanie] Our house is very secure. -What?
translation.it: …la casa è sicura. - Ma per favore. Guardala. - Dev'essere stato qualcuno che conosceva.

translation.en: -Please. Look at her. -It has to have been someone he knew.
translation.it: - Ma per favore. Guardala. - Dev'essere stato qualcuno che conosceva.

translation.en: It was her, the daughter.
Well, I see.
Well, when you have multiple awards for your investigative journalism,
translation.it: Beh, quando sarai pluripremiata per il tuo giornalismo investigativo

translation.en: and a Sunday Times bestseller, you can be the judge of character around here.
translation.it: e avrai un bestseller del Sunday Times, potrai giudicare le persone.

translation.en: No offense.
Well, Mr. Ngesi, if I did not clean up after you, I would think you were an arrogant ass.
translation.it: Beh, sig. Ngesi, se non lavorassi per lei, penserei che sia un coglione arrogante.

translation.en: [in Tswana] There's no underestimating you, Zenzi.
[in English] Indeed.
Hello.
[woman] Zenzi?
-It's not your day today. -I know.
translation.it: - Non tocca a te. - Lo so.

translation.en: But I can't come in later this week. A-and I really need to speak to Mr. Hendricks.
translation.it: Non posso venire in settimana e devo parlare con il sig. Hendricks.

translation.en: Please, Nancy. I need the work.
translation.it: Ti prego, Nancy. Ho bisogno di lavorare.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
[Hendricks] I pay you to solve my problems. I don't pay you so I can solve my own problems. So fucking solve it.
translation.it: Ti pago per risolvere i miei problemi, quindi risolvili, cazzo.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, Zenzi, what the fuck are you doing here? What day is it?
translation.it: Ehi, Zenzi, che cazzo ci fai qui? Che giorno è?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Hendricks. Nancy said I can work today.
translation.it: Nancy ha detto che oggi posso lavorare.

translation.en: [Hendricks] Nancy said. Okay, but you're not supposed to see this shit.
translation.it: Lo ha detto Nancy. Ok, ma tu non hai visto niente.

translation.en: You can keep your mouth shut, right?
translation.it: - Sai tenere la bocca chiusa, vero? - So cosa fate.

translation.en: I know what you do here, sir. I've worked here for a while now.
translation.it: - Sai tenere la bocca chiusa, vero? - So cosa fate. - Lavoro qui da un po'. - Lo so. Fatti gli affari tuoi e pulisci.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. Just… [grumbles] …mind your own business and clean something.
translation.it: - Lavoro qui da un po'. - Lo so. Fatti gli affari tuoi e pulisci.

translation.en: "Keep it away from Zenzi. Just let her clean."
translation.it: "Non coinvolgere Zenzi". Max non ha detto altro.

translation.en: That's all Max asked for. What the fuck am I supposed to do?
translation.it: "Non coinvolgere Zenzi". Max non ha detto altro. Ma cosa dovrei fare?

translation.en: You're happy working here, right?
Yes. Yes. Of course, sir.
You've been good to us, sir. Don't you forget that.
Um, I've been meaning to ask, sir--
I can't give you another advance, Zenzi. I wish this was my money, but it's not.
translation.it: Non posso darti un altro anticipo. Questi soldi non sono miei.

translation.en: I'm not looking for money.
I'm looking for Max.
-Max is in jail. -No, he got out. Yesterday.
translation.it: - Max è in prigione. - No, è uscito ieri.

translation.en: What are you telling me?
Nobody told me.
Nobody fucking told me. Somebody's getting cut up for this.
translation.it: Non lo sapevo. Qualcuno la pagherà per questo.

translation.en: Fuck.
You know Max is welcome here, right? So where the fuck is he?
translation.it: Sai che Max è il benvenuto qui. Allora, dove cazzo è?

translation.en: That's what I'm asking you, sir.
I went to fetch him yesterday, but…
translation.it: Ieri sono andata a prenderlo, ma

translation.en: he wasn't there. I… I… I can't find him.
translation.it: non c'era. Non so dove sia.

translation.en: Okay, listen…
you and me, we need to find Max.
There's a lot of shit happening out there, okay? A lot of unfinished business.
translation.it: È un vero casino. Ci sono molti affari in sospeso.

translation.en: And would, uh, would Jackson know?
Jackson Thom, your partner.
Jackson Thom is no partner of mine, okay? He's a fucking sociopath.
translation.it: Jackson non è mio socio. È un sociopatico del cazzo.

translation.en: I'm warning you, Zenzi. Stay away from him. He's dangerous. And Max owes him money.
translation.it: Bada, Zenzi. Stagli alla larga. È pericoloso e Max gli deve dei soldi.

translation.en: And if Jackson knows Max is out, that is a bad move for Max.
translation.it: E saranno guai se Jackson scopre che Max è uscito.

translation.en: Fuck.
You and me, we're gonna stay far away from Jackson. You hear me?
translation.it: Staremo alla larga da Jackson. Intesi?

translation.en: -Okay. -[Hendricks] What the fuck?
[man] Fuck, Raymond. Those fuckers moved on us. Jackson's guys.
translation.it: Raymond, siamo stati attaccati dagli uomini di Jackson.

translation.en: -We took some hits. -[Hendricks] Those motherfuckers!
You… You get out of here, okay?
Leave it with me. I'll find Max.
translation.it: Ci penso io a trovare Max.

translation.en: Move him to the back.
Those motherfuckers. Put him down. Just put him down.
[Nancy] See you next week.
-[Hendricks] Where the fuck is Joseph? -[man] We don't know. He wasn't there.
translation.it: - Alla settimana prossima. - E Joseph? Non lo sappiamo. Non c'era.

translation.en: [Zenzi] Nancy.
Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.it: Sai dove posso trovare Jackson Thom? È importante.

translation.en: -[injured man grunting] -[Hendricks] Bite on this. Bite! Fuck.
translation.it: Mordilo. Mordi! - Merda. - Nancy, ti prego.

translation.en: Nancy, please.
[Hendricks] This is a fucking mess.
Do you remember that night when I told Bevan that you were with me?
translation.it: Ricordi quando dissi a Bevan che eri con me?

translation.en: When you were…
Ruthless, Zenzi. Ruthless.
Hi.
I'm looking for a job. Yeah, the boss is over there.
translation.it: - Sto cercando un lavoro. - Il capo è laggiù.

translation.en: [Zenzi shouts] Excuse me!
Hello.
I'm looking for the boss.
Well, the boss isn't here. I can take a message.
translation.it: Il capo non c'è, ma puoi lasciare un messaggio.

translation.en: Are you Jackson?
Am I supposed to know you? Who sent you? I'm looking for my husband.
translation.it: - Ci conosciamo? Chi ti ha mandato? - Sto cercando mio marito.

translation.en: I know you. You work for Raymond.
translation.it: So chi sei. Tu lavori per Raymond.

translation.en: What do you do? Clean his toilets?
You're Max's little wife. You don't need to answer. I know that.
translation.it: Sei la moglie di Max. Non serve che tu risponda. Lo so.

translation.en: It's my business to know things.
Honestly…
he was better off inside.
'Cause outside, they can't protect him.
Max, he owes me…
a lot.
I've been sitting here, waiting for him to knock on my door.
translation.it: Ho aspettato che venisse a bussare alla mia porta,

translation.en: Wondering that…
if he doesn't show…
am I going to need collateral?
Now I'm wondering…
if collateral didn't just walk into my workshop.
translation.it: è appena entrata nella mia officina.

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with me. -Oh, that's where you're wrong.
translation.it: - Io non c'entro niente. - È qui che ti sbagli.

translation.en: It's got everything to do with you.
Until Max pays me, whatever's Max's is mine.
translation.it: Finché Max non mi paga, ciò che è suo mi appartiene.

translation.en: And I might as well enjoy it.
translation.it: E tanto vale che me lo goda.

translation.en: [exclaims] No! No!
[Jackson] You should put that away.
You might hurt yourself.
[Zenzi] Don't come closer. I'll… I'll just leave.
[coughing] Fucking bitch.
Fuck! [coughs, grunts]
What the fuck?
Help.
Help. Help.
[Zenzi] Hey. Hey.
No, no, no, no, no, no. No.
[shakily] No, no.
[crying] Wait.
Jackson, please, no.
Jackson! Jackson!
-Hello? -[Mr. Ngesi] It was the daughter.
You were right. The daughter killed her father.
translation.it: Avevi ragione. Ha ucciso lei il padre.

translation.en: I don't know how you knew it, but you hit the nail right on the head.
translation.it: Non so come facessi a saperlo, ma ci hai preso in pieno.

translation.en: Hello?
Are you there?
Yes, sir. I'm here.
Well, actually, I wanted to speak to you about a new idea for a book.
translation.it: Vorrei parlarti di una nuova idea per un libro,

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe better when you get here.
I think you're actually gonna like this one.
Hello?
Zenzile, is everything okay?
I'm fine.
[inhales sharply] I'll call you later, okay?
Just drop by when you get the--
[Mr. Ngesi] What do we really know about the invisible women in our lives?
translation.it: Conosciamo davvero le donne invisibili delle nostre vite?

translation.en: They wash our clothes,
sweep our floors, know us better than we know ourselves,
translation.it: puliscono i pavimenti, ci conoscono meglio di noi stessi,

translation.en: sometimes more than we'd like to admit.
translation.it: a volte più di quanto vorremmo ammettere.

translation.en: How often do we reach out into their lives
translation.it: Quante volte entriamo nelle loro vite

translation.en: the way they seamlessly move in and out of ours?
translation.it: con la stessa facilità con cui penetrano nelle nostre?

translation.en: Do we dare to look outside of our self-involved lives?
translation.it: Abbiamo il coraggio di guardare al di là delle nostre vite egocentriche?

translation.en: But one momentary interaction can remind even an aging narcissist
translation.it: Un breve contatto può ricordare a un narcisista di una certa età

translation.en: that there's life outside of our own.
translation.it: che non esiste solo la nostra vita.

translation.en: A rich tapestry of stories,
translation.it: Esiste un ricco tessuto di storie,

translation.en: tragedy, resilience.
I want to write a new story.
translation.it: Voglio scrivere una nuova storia. INSIGNIFICANTE

translation.en: The story of a woman, softly-spoken, unremarkable
translation.it: È la storia di una donna pacata, insignificante,

translation.en: but with a dignity of strength I haven't often seen,
translation.it: ma con una dignità che raramente ho incontrato,

translation.en: who's taken knock after knock but finds the strength to get back up,
translation.it: che ha incassato un colpo dopo l'altro, ma che trova la forza di rialzarsi.

translation.en: a woman I'd like to call a friend.
To a younger man, maybe even more.
translation.it: e, se fossi più giovane, non solo.

translation.en: Who's seen the worst of heartbreak, but who has resolved to live,
translation.it: Che ha sofferto tantissimo, ma che ha deciso di vivere.

translation.en: to live with the best of hearts and make the right decisions, always.
translation.it: Di vivere con entusiasmo e di prendere le decisioni giuste, sempre.

translation.en: [Mr. Ngesi] What will happen to this woman when the world around her is in chaos…
translation.it: Cosa succede a questa donna quando il mondo intorno al lei è nel caos?

translation.en: [Hendricks] Quick! Get those boxes out of here.
[Mr. Ngesi] …when her limits are tested, her principles,
when her back is against the wall?
translation.it: quando è con le spalle al muro?

translation.en: -Then we'll see who she really is. -[Hendricks] You, hurry up!
Zenzi, this is not a good time.
Nancy, move it. This is the first place they're gonna come to.
translation.it: Muoviti. È il primo posto in cui verranno.

translation.en: They're coming right fucking now. Twenty minutes max. Wipe the drives.
translation.it: Saranno qui al massimo tra 20 minuti. Formatta gli hard disk.

translation.en: Joseph, you take the car and get out of here.
If they're gonna search this place, the only thing they're gonna find is the finest cuts of tomahawk steaks, you get me?
translation.it: Se perquisiranno questo posto, troveranno solo ottime bistecche tomahawk.

translation.en: You.
You shouldn't be here right now.
Okay, motherfuckers, move it! It's day zero!
translation.it: Ok, figli di puttana, muoviamoci! Dev'essere come nuovo!

translation.en: Okay.
Holy mother of fuck.
Jackson Thom is dead.
The guy you came to ask about just a few hours ago, he's dead.
translation.it: La persona su cui mi hai chiesto informazioni è morta.

translation.en: But somehow I get the feeling you already know that, don't you?
translation.it: Ma qualcosa mi dice che lo sapessi già, vero?

translation.en: The whole fucking city's gonna think that I did it and with my own gun.
translation.it: Penseranno che sia stato io con la mia pistola.

translation.en: -They're here. -[Raymond] You stay here.
And don't you say a fucking word, you got me?
And hide that thing.
Uys and Van der Merwe, I want you in there. Thorough checks, okay?
translation.it: Uys e Van Der Merwe andate lì. Non lasciate niente al caso.

translation.en: Twala, Bennett, that side. Even the freezers.
translation.it: Twala, Bennett, laggiù. Controllate anche i freezer.

translation.en: You, I want you in there.
Check hard drives, files, boxes, computers…
translation.it: Controllate hard disk, file, scatole, computer…

translation.en: Come on. The rest follow me.
I want you on that side. Bring me anything significant.
translation.it: Tu vai da quella parte. Segnala ogni cosa rilevante.

translation.en: Let's go.
You sure no one followed you? [Joseph] Got out just in time, I guess.
translation.it: - Sicuro che non ti abbiano seguito? - Sono uscito in tempo.

translation.en: Drove around a couple hours.
translation.it: Ho guidato per un paio d'ore.

translation.en: -What's going on, boss? -[Hendricks] I wish I fucking knew.
-Somehow Max is right in the middle of it. -Max?
translation.it: - Max è in qualche modo coinvolto. - Max?

translation.en: Max and his bitch wife.
She took my gun and some cash, and now Jackson is dead.
translation.it: Ha preso la mia pistola, e ora Jackson è morto.

translation.en: Everyone is gonna think it was us. [sighs] And Blessing?
translation.it: - Tutti penseranno che siamo stati noi. - E Blessing?

translation.en: The devil himself.
Right on cue.
[Blessing on phone] You've really fucked things up now, huh?
What part of "keep the peace" don't you motherfuckers understand?
translation.it: Quale parte di "mantenere la pace" voi stronzi non avete capito?

translation.en: [Hendricks] I'm looking into it.
[Blessing] Yes, you are. Come and see me.
[Joseph] If you go,
you might not come back.
[Hendricks] I know.
But I'm working on something.
translation.it: ma ho in mente un piano.

translation.en: Hello?
[in Tswana] Is it you?
[in English] I really need you.
Hello?
[driver in Afrikaans] Hey! Get in!
Friend…
What happened?
[man] There.
Let's have a chat.
You were at Raymond Hendricks's business earlier today.
translation.it: Stamattina era nell'azienda di Raymond Hendricks.

translation.en: I…
You clean for Raymond Hendricks?
translation.it: Lei fa le pulizie per Raymond Hendricks?

translation.en: -I do. -[detective] And?
And I went there today…
even though it wasn't my day to work.
translation.it: anche se non toccava a me.

translation.en: I just…
I was going because I was trying to find my husband.
translation.it: ci sono andata per cercare mio marito.

translation.en: Mr. Hendricks couldn't help me either.
translation.it: Nemmeno il sig. Hendricks sapeva nulla.

translation.en: And so…
He left it open.
I don't know why I took it.
I wasn't even thinking. I was just trying to find Max.
translation.it: Non era mia intenzione, volevo solo trovare Max.

translation.en: [detective] We have reason to believe Raymond's involved in organized criminal activity.
translation.it: Crediamo che Raymond sia coinvolto in attività criminali.

translation.en: Did you see any drugs at the butchery or weapons?
translation.it: Ha visto droga o armi nella macelleria?

translation.en: I'm just a cleaner.
Does the name "Jackson Thom" mean anything to you?
translation.it: Il nome "Jackson Thom" le dice qualcosa?

translation.en: [detective] He was found dead today, and we think it was a gangland hit.
translation.it: È morto oggi, e pensiamo si sia trattato di un regolamento di conti.

translation.en: We think your husband could be involved.
We understand there's history there. When's the last time you saw him?
translation.it: Sappiamo che ci sono dei trascorsi. Quando l'ha visto l'ultima volta?

translation.en: A week ago. [detective] Do you perhaps have a recent photograph of him?
translation.it: - Una settimana fa. - Ha una sua foto recente?

translation.en: [Zenzi] Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.it: Sai dove posso trovare Jackson Thom? È importante.

translation.en: [detective] That's our guy.
Hold on.
If you hear from your husband, if you see him, if you can think of anything,
translation.it: Se sentisse suo marito, se lo vedesse, se le venisse in mente qualcosa,

translation.en: I want to know.
And woman to woman, I can help you out of a scene you don't want to be any part of.
translation.it: E detto tra noi, posso aiutarla a uscire da una situazione indesiderata.

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what happened?
Maybe another time.
Tonight…
We cannot have that type of disruption happening here.
translation.it: Non gradiamo questo tipo di visite.

translation.en: If you are involved in something, we cannot have it.
translation.it: Non possiamo permetterci di essere coinvolti in qualcosa.

translation.en: I know.
I'm sorry, sir. I…
And I'm not involved in anything.
It's your first warning.
Asshole.
Friend…
you've gotta stand up for yourself.
[Zenzi] What do you want?
Just to talk.
Then talk.
I have a job offer.
From Raymond. Another target.
translation.it: Da parte di Raymond. Un altro obiettivo.

translation.en: I am not a killer for hire. [man] So far so good, I say.
translation.it: - Non uccido per soldi. - Non te la sei cavata male.

translation.en: Get in, get out… unsuspected.
You're invisible.
[man] Do it, and you get paid for your trouble. But don't… [inhales]
translation.it: Se lo fai, verrai pagata per il disturbo, ma se non lo fai…

translation.en: …and the police might learn who really pulled the trigger on Jackson Thom.
translation.it: la polizia saprà chi ha sparato davvero a Jackson Thom.

translation.en: They won't believe you.
They will believe it's Max. My husband is not a murderer.
translation.it: - Incolperanno Max. - Non è un assassino.

translation.en: He should've taken the money and done the time like he was told. But Max…
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto prendere i soldi e fare come gli avevano detto, ma Max…

translation.en: Max had to fuck around with the wrong people.
translation.it: ha scherzato con le persone sbagliate.

translation.en: Who did Max take the fall for?
translation.it: Per chi si è preso la colpa?

translation.en: Why? [man] All you need to know is
if Max hadn't stepped out of line, your son would still be alive.
translation.it: se Max fosse stato al suo posto, tuo figlio non sarebbe morto.

translation.en: The boy didn't have to die. It's all Max's fault.
translation.it: Quel bambino non doveva morire. È tutta colpa di Max.

translation.en: [announcer over PA system] The next train does not stop here.
translation.it: Questo treno non si ferma qui.

translation.en: Just a friendly reminder. What happened to Esulu could easily happen--
translation.it: Non dimenticare che quello che è successo a Esulu potrebbe accadere a…

translation.en: Don't you say his name.
translation.it: Non osare pronunciare il suo nome.

translation.en: Did he even shed a tear when he found out his soft little son was dead?
translation.it: Ha pianto quando ha scoperto che il suo adorato figlioletto era morto?
